questions.q: What is science?
questions.a: Science is the study of the natural world.

questions.q: Why do we use the scientific method?
questions.a: To explore questions and find answers.

questions.q: What is matter?
questions.a: Anything that has mass and takes up space.

questions.a: A force that slows things down.
